#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int test_cases,num;
    scanf("%d",&test_cases);
    unsigned long long int sol[test_cases],prev_sum=0;
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
    {
        prev_sum=0;
        scanf("%d",&num);
        if(num==0)
            sol[i]=0;
        else
        {
            sol[i]=(num*(4*num-3));
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
        printf("%llu\n",sol[i]);
}
